channel.title: Blog on Atoms of Us
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Atoms of Us

item.title: Our 8 Favorite Hikes of 2022
item.description: In December of 2021, we decided we were going to quit our jobs and live in a van full time, traveling the country and exploring the outdoors.

item.title: All of Our Hikes to Date
item.description: Drop us a line on instagram if you are planning to take one of these hikes yourself!

item.title: Our Journery So Far (The First 3 Months in the Van)
item.description: It has been three months since we quit our jobs, sold (almost) all of our belongings, and hit the road to travel America in our converted van.
